price: Munibuke (yemwe bene Isiraheli) ubwo twakiraga isezerano ryanyu (ryo kubahiriza amategeko ya Tawurati), tukanazamura umusozi hejuru yanyu (tugiye kuwububikaho), (turababwira tuti) “Ngaho nimwakire ibyo twabahaye (Tawurati) mubikomeze, kandi muzirikane ibirimo kugira ngo mugandukire Imana.”
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمُ ٱلطُّورَ خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh akhadhnā mīthāqakum warafaʿnā fawqakumu al-ṭūra khudhū mā ātaynākum biquwwatin wa-udh'kurū mā fīhi laʿallakum tattaqūna
